download.question: When can I download the sheet music after purchase?
download.answer: You can download immediately after payment is completed from My Page. Purchased sheet music can be re-downloaded anytime.

payment.question: What payment methods are available?
payment.answer: We support credit cards, debit cards, bank transfers, and convenient payment methods (Kakao Pay).

refund.question: How can I get a refund?
refund.answer: Due to the nature of digital products, refunds are only available before download. Refunds are difficult after download, so please purchase carefully.

format.question: What file format are the sheet music files?
format.answer: All sheet music is provided in high-quality PDF format. Optimized for both printing and digital devices.

print.question: Can I print the downloaded sheet music?
print.answer: Yes, you can print for personal practice use. However, commercial use or redistribution is prohibited.

difficulty.question: How are difficulty levels classified?
difficulty.answer: They are classified as Beginner (basic patterns), Intermediate (including variation patterns), and Advanced (including complex techniques).

what.question: What is the custom order service?
what.answer: It is a customized service where professionals create drum sheet music for your desired song.

duration.question: How long does production take?
duration.answer: It usually takes 1-7 days depending on the complexity of the song. Exact schedule will be provided individually after application.

cost.question: How is the production cost determined?
cost.answer: We provide quotes by comprehensively considering the song's length, complexity, and difficulty level.
